Html:
I am new to D3, Can any one suggest me how to create a BarChart in Wpf using D3. I am working with VS 2012.

Thanks in advance.

Hi

As per my knowledge D3 will not support Bar Charts.

Regards
Ravi
hello thanks Ravi, ah what about bubble and all? only plenty of "LineGraph"s here.

Hi

DDD works very good for line graphs. Works very well(outperformed) than most of the paid controls.

Since DDD is wpf char controls you can draw bubbles or markers very easily (you can very easily customize and can draw any shape)

But, If your requirement is more bubbles or custom markers (more than 5000) then you may get performance issues. Because here in DDD every control/ shape is children to parent control. (If you add 5000 children to parent panel/grid think what will happen).

Regards
Ravi.
Hi Ravi, Can you plz guide me how to draw markers on a line? i tried but unable to fix it.
